name: tinyapp
description: URL shortening service similar to TinyURL, Bitly, or Goo.gl. In essence, a URL Shortener is a service that takes a regular URL and transforms it into an encoded version, which redirects back to the original URL.
author: Rauber Simoes do Nascimento <raubersn@gmail.com> (https://github.com/raubersn/)
